text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Arab chemists conference starts in Baghdad today (Tuesday).
- Two people killed and three injured in Basra when a bomb dropped during the U.S.-led aggression on Iraq in 1991 exploded.
(The above stories were also carried by JUMHOURIYA and QADISSIYA)
- Police arrest a gang specialised in car robbery.
- Italy to open an interest section in Baghdad.
